title: new yorick skin needed
body: {{champion:83}}  is a great champ to play but cause there is a lack of skins for him the champion is under play. the community in league wants him to stay the way he is, not getting changed by the new uprisings of changes to under played champs. we have a couple of ideas in for you. we need a uprise in the community for yorick to be brought back from the edge of destruction and in the game as a fun newly skinned champ

replies.body: They did this with Galio, giving him a debonair skin. People admired it for around a week, then they go back to asking "who's Galio?"
riots waiting to rework him, and will most likely release a skin with that rework, which is actually more exciting. otherwise in terms of relevant champs lissandra is the most in need of a new skin

> the community in league wants him to stay the way he is, not getting changed by the new uprisings of changes to under played champs.

No champion can escape this fate. He will be reworked. I'd say this year or the next.
i  agree with u completely dude hes very good in the right hands an for a old champ 2 skins is not that good but they might do it after his rework
